column5: Anybody know where I can get some brackets that would take a vertical 2x4  holding side racks around a home made utility trailer. Preferable galvanized to bolt into wood. Tried Princess Auto and HD Thanks Peter

They have these bolt on stake pockets. Not sure if they're exactly what you're looking for.  http://www.princessauto.com/en/detail/tapered-bolt-on-stake-pocket/A-p8240863e  TSC has them to, but only in store.  http://www.tscstores.com/Search.aspx?k=Stake+Pockets
Thanks. These should work. Might have to cut the 2x4 a bit. Great!
Most welding/fabrication shops could make them for you.
